channel.title: Real godsword special anims?
channel.description: Hey guys.. I've added everything on my server dealing with 100%working gs stances thanks to SilentCj's tut.. But i would like to make it morecomplete with real Gs specials! like ags, sgs, bgs, zgs! i would appreciate a tut i could see in order to add bc it would be awesome to have the real gs specials.. also i would like to know whether or not its client or server sided.. i would prefer in my experience that its client sided.. bc i would guess it would deal with a certain model.. but plz just post a reply to help me out plz? thanks :D

item.title: Real godsword special anims?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

SilentCJ’s tut gets rid of the way you hold the DH axe…
So you’re holding it backwards…facing behind you…

Read full topic

item.title: Real godsword special anims?
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

jamessemple:

a daresay that it is both client sided and server sided

not really… ive added everything i just want to add the special attacks animations… just need a simple well directed tutorial to do so…
